passage_text: A Mechanical Engineer in Muscat earns an average salary of OMR 11,545 per year. Most people move on to other jobs if they have more than 20 years' experience in this career. A skill in Microsoft Word is associated with high pay for this job. Experience strongly influences income

(Oman). A Mechanical Engineer in Muscat earns an average salary of OMR 11,545 per year. Most people move on to other jobs if they have more than 20 years' experience in this career. A skill in Microsoft Word is associated with high pay for this job. Experience strongly influences income

Mechanical Engineer Salary. (Oman). A Mechanical Engineer earns an average salary of OMR 10,026 per year. The highest paying skills associated with this job are Microsoft Word, Microsoft Office, AutoCAD, Project, and Project Management. Experience strongly influences income for this job. Most people move on to other jobs if they have more than 20 years' experience in this career.
